title: Sign Up for the Free Newsletter | Acupuncture Today
cleaned_text: Low back pain is defined as pain the posterior superior iliac spine (PSIS), and it can be acute or chronic, localized or radiating. It is a common ailment for adults in the United States, with a lifetime prevalence as high as 65-80%. Whether or not an MRI is available to provide definitive knowledge of a structural issue, acupuncture can be an effective treatment for low back pain.| Digital Exclusive AT News Update Registration AT News Update is an information-rich, practitioner-targeted e-newsletter that is the ideal platform to share information about your products or services with our targeted audience. Subscription based, this update provides article summaries and links to the full articles
